title: Nine digits puzzle
nb: Arrange the digits 1-9 to make a nine digit number such that the first digit is divisible by one, the first two digits are divisible by two, the first three divisible by three ...
description: Arrange the digits 1-9 to make a nine digit number such that the first digit is divisible by one, the first two digits divisible by two, the first three divisible by three ...
